desc: Bloody Heaven menstrual cup is a reusable alternative to period pads and tampons Made from 100% soft medical grade silicone. It’s a great alternative, cheaper, healthier and eco friendly, with no single use plastic or regular waste. No TSS!

layout.text: The menstrual cup allows up to 12 hours protection (depending on your flow). Of course you can change it as often as you need to, but know that it is safely tucked away in your vagina doing no harm until you're ready to remove it, clean it and re-insert.
